alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit; Haleakala Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 07 at 7:08PM HST until December 09 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR LEEWARD KOHALA... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF BIG ISLAND MAUI LANAI AND KAHOOLAWE... .Trade winds will strengthen tonight, and peak Thursday and Friday. Strongest winds will occur over and downwind of terrain, and in saddle areas. ...WIND ADVISORY FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 6 PM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Across upper elevations of Big Island Summits, east winds increasing to 45 to 55 mph with gusts to 65 mph. On Haleakala Summit, east winds increasing to 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Summits of Maui and the Big Island. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 6 PM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
